attributes.review: This is the worst app i have ever gotten in my entire life and i would never recommend it to anyone. When i downloaded it it took a WHOLE MONTH to download and when it was downloading i couldn't turn off my phone or charge it. Also when i opened the app all it did was make a really loud screaming noise that made all my family die!!
attributes.title: very bad

attributes.review: This app is so bad, it made my phone glitch, lose battery power quickly, and took so much space on my phone. I do not recommend anyone else putting this app in your phone. Once I’m done with the review I’m deleting this horrid app, as you should do ad well. Please take this app off of the App Store in the favor of Apple users, eliminated any risk of cellphone malfunctions. 👁👄👁 💅🏼
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER !!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWLOAD

attributes.review: this app is an absolute mess. first, it took 3 tries to download properly and was always constantly glitchy and laggy. it wasn’t even organized properly. it took up so much storage and made my whole phone become all laggy. what a waste of space. i hate this and would NEVER recommend this to anyone.
attributes.title: horrible experience

attributes.review:
First of all this is just awful design. Like I opened the app and first thing I saw was trumps neck fat being pinched my his collar. 
Second, when I reopened it (bc i had to close it cause of the neck fat) there was a terrible shriek noise and it made my sister go insane. She started jumping around yelling gibberish and nonsense. I tried to talk to her but all she said was “DONALD TRUMP NEED GO BYE BYE!” I i was like “yeah ik” and we just vibed
attributes.title: the worst app ever created

attributes.review: i downloaded this app because it had the name of our lord and king, donald trump on it. as soon as this app finished downloading a bad, orange rash began spreading across my skin. it was rough and itchy. i went to tell my friend about the rash but when i started speaking i realized that everything coming out of my mouth sounded crazy. i couldn’t finish any of my sentences and none of my points were valid. i deleted the app right away and my symptoms were gone immediately. trump is the real virus. he spreads hate and division within this country. we still have a chance to make 2020 a better year: vote out trump.
attributes.title: worst app i’ve ever downloaded

attributes.review: This app keeps freezing when I open it then it exits me off the app it has even deleted its self from my phone at one point. I have never had troubles with my phone but when I downloaded this my phone starting dying much faster and sometime it dies around 30-40%. Do not recommend it may mess up your phone.
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: The app was extremely buggy and was messing with my phone. I tried to download the app and it took forever to download as soon as it did download it glitched out so many times. I am very dissatisfied with this app. You would think that an administration that spends so much time on social media would have an app that would run more smoothly.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: THIS IS THE WORST APP EVER!!! I downloaded this app for the lovely orange president, and my phone went black for a whole hour, because my phone realized that it downloaded the app of a racist, rapist president. After my phone when black I had to power it back on and delete the app for it my phone to work properly. Also must I add that BLACK LIVES MATTER AND IT’S CRAZY HOW YOU ARE OUR PRESIDENT AND ARE TRYING TO FIND EVERY WAY TO SHUT OUR VOICES DOWN! GOOD LUCK WE’RE TOO STRONG✊🏼😌
attributes.title: BLACK LIVESS MATTER
